metadata.title: httpd: HTTP Response Splitting in multiple modules (low)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in httpd. A HTTP response splitting in multiple httpd modules may allow an attacker that can inject malicious response headers into backend applications to cause an HTTP desynchronization attack. 
            STATEMENT: This flaw is only exploitable by a malicious backend in a reverse proxy configuration or an attack against a backend application which inserts headers.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
httpd is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
